title: Gamma Distribution
contentHtml: The Gamma distribution is a continuous probability distribution that arises from the amount of time until the nth event occurs in a Poisson process.
intuition: The Gamma distribution is a natural extension of the exponential distribution, allowing for more complex event arrival patterns.
realWorldApplications: Modeling waiting times in queuing systems
